title: Mystery Champ Challenge 7/1
body:
Whichever mystery champion you receive, main them until the next patch! 

I will accept this challenge , will you?

replies.body: Can't. I get a SKIN. Yay owning all champs XD

> [{quoted}](name=Sukishoo,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=jaIJ8Fu9,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-07-01T18:27:30.167+0000)
>
> Can't. I get a SKIN. Yay owning all champs XD

You could main whatever champ you get the skin for until next patch!
good idea!
Challenge accepted.
